profile:
Dedicated to Serving Our Customers in Salmon Arm, Kelowna, Okanagan & the Surrounding Area

Bee’s Knees Plumbing and Heating, Ltd. began as the dream of our two Founders, Kevin and Sylvana, and first opened its doors in August of 2019. The “bee’s knees” is 1920s slang that in the most basic terms means something is very nice, very good, the best, the latest, the greatest, or simply excellent. Where the term bee’s knees originated from is up for debate. Some believe that it is related to the fact that when bees go from flower to flower, some of the nectar, or sweet goodness, winds up sticking to their knees. Others contend that the term stems from the expression “be all and end all” because a shortened version of the phrase is “B’s and E’s,” which sounds like bee’s knees. To us, the phrase represents joy, quality, and care, and we want our customers to feel like we’re the bee’s knees to them as their trusted service providers.

Our Team is the Bee’s Knees!
Our hive is currently made up of fourteen team members, and we all pride ourselves on providing high-quality workmanship paired with excellent customer service. We like to have fun at Bee’s Knees, and we value our team members just as much as we do our customers. Our friendly and positive work environment creates a fantastic experience for our customers, making sure that you feel secure and taken care of on every job. As an added bonus, all of us at Bee’s Knees are big fans of dogs, so you can be confident your pup will be spoiled with belly rubs while we are there, and we are always sure to close the gate behind us to keep your pups safe.

OUR CORE VALUES:
Quality comes first
BEE empathetic at all times
Always strive for self-improvement
Project a positive and professional attitude
Combining Classic Customer Service with Modern Convenience

We like to combine good old-fashioned service with contemporary technology to create an unparalleled service experience for you. To schedule an appointment with Bee’s Knees Plumbing and Heating Ltd., you can call, text, or book directly on our website, whatever is most convenient for you. You’ll receive updates from our dispatcher to keep you in the loop, and an “on my way” notification when our technician is on the way so that you’re never left in the dark. Our technicians will always provide options and an estimate for your approval before starting the work, that way there are no surprise fees or complications for you to worry about.

Gas contractor license #LGA0208448
Electrical contractor license # LEL0210987
